intro.description: Before we can produce target solutions, we need need to load some ownship data. We'll do that using these steps.

item.title: Find SATC subfolder
item.description: From earlier steps, you are now familiar with the Navigator. In the Navigator view, open the SATC sub-folder

item.title: Load ownship track
item.description: From the SATC sub-folder, drag the L1_OwnshipTrack.rep file into the Debrief plot area. (Or, right click it, and select "Open With > Debrief Plot Editor").

item.title: Load ownship sensor data
item.description:
You should now see the Debrief editor, with a blue ownship track.
Next, we will load the ownship sensor (sonar) data, by dragging in the L1_OwnshipSensor.dsf file. Follow the Wizard steps to load the sensor data, give it a color, and indicate that Yes, you wish it to be visible.

item.title: Check sensor data is visible
item.description:
You did follow the wizard steps correctly, didn't you?
If you haven't got a bearing fan displayed on the plot, use the Outline View View to navigate to the Plain sensor within the Ownship track, and make it visible.
